settings.timeline_text: Order now to get it by

settings.template_description:
Experience the benefits of Chaga and Lion's Mane mushrooms in every cup. Packed with essential nutrients, these powerful mushrooms support your immune and hormonal systems, enhancing your overall well-being. Lion's Mane nootropics like hericenones and erinacines promote brain health by stimulating neuron growth.

Enjoy the rich, delicious flavor of our 100% organic Arabica coffee, infused with 1200 mg of mushroom extracts per serving ( Lion's Mane 616 mg, Chaga 618 mg). Replace your regular coffee with our blend for a perfect start to your day.

P.s. It tastes just like coffee, not mushrooms!

settings.heading: Benefits
settings.content:
• Memory and cognitive function
  • Unique coffee blend
  • Anti-fatigue properties
  • Improved athletic performance

settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content:
90% USDA Organic Arabica Coffee, 5% USDA Organic Lion's Mane Mushroom Powder,5% USDA Organic Chaga Mushroom Powder.

Flavor: Milk with slightly sweet and nutty notes.

settings.heading: Directions
settings.content: Can be used in a coffee maker or for pour-over, including Chemex, Cafe Solo, Clever Dripper, Kalita Wave, Aeropress, Hario V60, Siphon & Cone Brewers, etc.

settings.heading: Warning
settings.content: Keep out of reach of children. Do not use if the safety seal is damaged or missing. Store in a cool, dry place.

settings.heading: + Relieves symptoms of anxiety and depression
settings.text: Lions Mane has been shown to have anti-inflammatory effects that reduce symptoms of anxiety and depression.

settings.heading: + Anti-inflammatory
settings.text: By boosting the creation of good cytokines, specialized proteins that regulate the immune system, Chaga promotes white blood cells, which are necessary for combating harmful bacteria and viruses which cause inflammation in the body.

settings.heading: + Increases mental focus
settings.text: Important for both exercise and work, Lions Mane, in combination with coffee, enhances neural connections for better focus, wakefulness, and cognitive function.

settings.heading: + Stabilizes blood sugar levels
settings.text: Multiple studies have shown Chaga to reduce insulin resistance in animals and can therefore help manage diabetes. This also allows for a steady release of energy throughout the day.

settings.title: This is a game changer!
settings.text: I've always struggled with brain fog in the mornings. This mushroom coffee not only wakes me up but keeps me sharp all day. Plus, it tastes just like my regular brew, which I wasn’t expecting. I love it!
settings.author: Marcus L.

settings.title: The perfect way to start my day
settings.text: With all the health benefits of chaga and lion's mane I feel more energetic and healthier. It's the perfect way to start my day.
settings.author: Aria T.

settings.title: Tastes amazing
settings.text: I was skeptical at first, but this blend tastes amazing. No weird mushroom flavor, just rich coffee goodness and great health benefits. I tried mushroom pills before but it didn’t stick. So far I’ve been taking my coffee daily and enjoying the benefits.
settings.author: Elliot R.

settings.title: Better focus
settings.text: I’ve noticed a significant improvement in my focus and productivity since switching to this coffee. I have ADHD and this stuff really helps me stay on track. It’s become an essential part of my morning routine.
settings.author: Lena F.

settings.title: So long regular coffee
settings.text: My usual coffee was giving me jitters. This mushroom coffee blend gives me a smooth, steady energy boost without the crash. Love it!
settings.author: Sanjana P.

settings.heading: What's the shipping cost?
settings.row_content: On average all order shipping costs are 4.5$ to any state in the US. International shipping costs may vary.

settings.heading: When will I receive my products?
settings.row_content:
All products are shipped out from our fulfilment center within 4-6 business days and on average it takes 1-5 business days to deliver your order. If things go smoothly, you place your order on Monday you should receive it by Friday the same week.

Every now and then, such as holiday seasons, there may be a delay on orders due to the high volume coming in within such a short time period. We value being transparent with our customers, so please be patient as we are a small team doing the best we can! Thanks for your understanding.

settings.heading: What's your return policy?
settings.row_content: In case you receive a product that has been damaged during shipment we will automatically ship out new product for you or issue a full refund. Refer to refund policy on footer of page. If you cancel a non subscription before the order is confirmed to ship you will be issued a full refund. Subscription items can be referred to in subscription policy in footer.

settings.heading: Where are the products manufactured?
settings.row_content: This product is produced under strict quality control standards, ensuring you receive a premium product every time.

settings.heading: Can I track my order?
settings.row_content: Once you will make a purchase and your order will be confirmed, we will send out an order tracking link.

settings.text: We have a no-questions-asked returns policy. Just drop us a line within 30 days and consider it done.

settings.title: Getting started
settings.text: The first 1-3 months are the most challenging. Its critical to stay consistent and disiciplined.

settings.title: First results
settings.text: In the 3-6 months period you will start seeing first results and feel much better.

settings.title: Long lasting
settings.text: Keep your routine going. Remember that you can loose everything in just one day.
